detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the back and wide ties at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the back and wide ties at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Cropped blouse in an airy viscose and cotton weave with short puff sleeves and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Smocking with a small frill trim around the sleeves and hem.

Short, fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with narrow shoulder straps, a seam below the bust, and a gathered section at the front with a small frill trim at the top. Visible seams down the front and back and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Headband in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the front. Width 9 cm.
Headband in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the front. Width 9 cm.

Fully-fashioned, glittery hi-top trainers with a ribbed trim at the ankles and a grosgrain loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Sturdy, patterned rubber soles.

Jacket in a cotton twill weave with a collar and buttons at the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, shoulder tabs, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Jacket in an airy, patterned weave with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Fitted, polo-neck top in soft jersey with long sleeves.

Set with six earrings and three ear cuffs made of metal in various sizes and designs.

Softshell trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, zip fly with a press-stud, diagonal side pockets and snow flaps at the hems. Brushed thermal inside. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Six pairs are decorated with glass rhinestones. Size from 0.2 to 2 cm.
Narrow metal rings in various designs decorated with rhinestones and plastic beads.
Metal bracelets in different designs decorated with acrylic beads, alabaster stones and shells.
Long top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a wide neckline and long sleeves. Straight cut with high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Three-strand necklace with metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
Bandeau bras in soft cotton jersey with side support and jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Straight-cut top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar in a cotton weave. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck.

Trousers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar and off-centre concealed press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Recycled polyester lining and padding.
Short dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
